sourcesContent:
<template>
  <MemoForm h1="Edit" button="Update" memo={{memo}} />
</template>

<script>
import MemoForm from "@/components/MemoForm.vue";

export default {
  name: "EditView",
  components: {
    MemoForm,
  },
  computed: {
    memo: function () {
      const id = parseInt(this.$route.params.id);
      return this.$store.getters.getSingleMemo(id);
    },
  },
};
</script>
